scripts.build-contract: solc contracts/Gravity.sol --abi -o abis --overwrite && solc contracts/Gravity.sol --bin -o bin --overwrite
scripts.prepare:hh: mustache configs/hardhat.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen
scripts.prepare:ok: mustache configs/optimistic_kovan.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen
scripts.prepare:op: mustache configs/optimism.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen
scripts.deploy-kovan: graph deploy c0rv0s/hashvalley-kovan --product hosted-service --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-optimism: graph deploy c0rv0s/hashvalley --product hosted-service --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
